articles.description: MADISON (WLUK) -- Coronavirus cases continued their decline in Wisconsin on Thursday, following a weeks-long trend. On the state's most recent weekly dashboard, only three area counties were listed in the "critically high" category for virus activity. Locally…

articles.title: Maine residents will get a card along with COVID-19 shot - Press Herald
articles.description: The cards are intended to simplify the process of getting vaccinated for coronavirus after patients receive the first of 2 shots.
articles.content:
PORTLAND Maine residents will be issued cards to simplify the process of getting vaccinated for coronavirus after they receive the first shot.
The state began a rollout of the vaccine this week and … [+1064 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Early data show two doses of Oxford/AstraZeneca vaccine provoked good immune response - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Oxford University's COVID-19 vaccine candidate has a better immune response when a two full-dose regime is used rather than a full-dose followed by a half-dose booster, the university said on Thursday, citing data from early trials.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: A test tube labeled with the vaccine is seen in front of AstraZeneca logo in this illustration taken, September 9, 2020. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/File Photo/File Photo
